system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision list item. Implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "list, item" date: "$Date: 2013-05-30 14:33:11 -0700 (Thu, 30 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92653 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xmlEV_LIST_ITEM_I
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xmlEV_ITEM_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_parentparent, ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_pixmap_equal_topixmap_equal_to end
../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xmlEV_TEXTABLE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_deselectable_i.xmlEV_DESELECTABLE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_is_selectableis_selectable end
../implementation_interface/ev_tooltipable_i.xmlEV_TOOLTIPABLE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_action_sequences_i.xmlEV_LIST_ITEM_ACTION_SEQUENCES_I
feature -- Status report
f_is_selectable../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_is_selectableis_selectable: FalseBOOLEAN -- May Current be selected? do Result := attached ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_parentparent as l_parent and then l_parent.../interface/ev_sensitive.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive end
feature -- Access
f_parent../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_parentparent: detachable ../interface/ev_list_item_list.xmlEV_LIST_ITEM_LIST -- List containing ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface. do Result ?= ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xml#f_parentPrecursor end
feature -- Contract support
f_pixmap_equal_to../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_pixmap_equal_topixmap_equal_to (a_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is a_pixmap equal to ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap? local scaled_pixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP list_parent: detachable ../interface/ev_list.xmlEV_LIST combo_parent: detachable ../interface/ev_combo_box.xmlEV_COMBO_BOX do if ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_parentparent /= Void then scaled_pixmap := a_pixmap.Falsetwin list_parent ?= ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_parentparent if list_parent /= Void then scaled_pixmap.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_stretchstretch (list_parent.../interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler.xml#f_pixmaps_widthpixmaps_width, list_parent.../interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler.xml#f_pixmaps_heightpixmaps_height) else combo_parent ?= ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_parentparent check has_combo_parent: combo_parent /= Void then end scaled_pixmap.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_stretchstretch (combo_parent.../interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler.xml#f_pixmaps_widthpixmaps_width, combo_parent.../interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler.xml#f_pixmaps_heightpixmaps_height) end else scaled_pixmap := a_pixmap end if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap as l_pixmap then Result := scaled_pixmap.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (l_pixmap) end end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_list_item.xmlEV_LIST_ITEM note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_interface/ev_list_item_i.xmlEV_LIST_ITEM_I
